FuncDef:
The nas-serial command configures the serial number of the AC, which is also called AC name.
The undo nas-serial command deletes the AC serial number.
By default, no serial number is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the AC serial number.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 characters. The character except ", *, SPACE, /, :, <, >, ?, @, \., |, %, '.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
when conducting mandatory web authentication, the device redirects the packet and hides its own IP address. Therefore, the device serial number can be set to replace the IP address. Usually the carrier formulates and configures the serial number on the device.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
